quotes: A day without sunshine is like, you know, night. - Steve Martin
I always wanted to be somebody, but now I realize I should have been more specific. -Lily Tomlin
There’s never enough time to do all the nothing you want. - Bill Watterson
Consider the postage stamp: its usefulness consists in the ability to stick to one thing ’til it gets there. - Josh Billings
When life gives you lemons, squirt someone in the eye. - Cathy Guisewite
I intend to live forever. So far, so good. - Steven Wright
What matters most in life are quotes and stuff that they tell you. -???
